articles.author: Richard Waters
articles.title: Uber makes first operating profit after racking up $31.5bn of losses - Financial Times
articles.description: Ride-hailing company reaches long-awaited landmark after years of heavy spending
articles.content:
Uber reported its first operating profit on Tuesday on the back of better control of costs, marking a turning point following years of heavy spending in an expensive dash for growth.
